item.description:
Enjoy an informal computer lesson while learning a lot!

  • Are you not so computer savvy?
  • Would you like to learn how to use the meetup site better?
  • Would you like to learn how to shop or sell on ebay?
  • How about just search the internet for great stuff?
  • Or anything else you need to learn...
  • ﻿

Bring all your questions about using the Meetup Site, as well as the other items listed above.  We will focus mainly on the meetup site first and then if time move on to the other items or whatever you specifically need to learn.

Bring your laptop if you have one or try to borrow one.  If not, that's okay, I'll have mine.

No Charge for this event!

Meet in the event room towards the back of the store.

This is Martin Luther King Jr. Day so if you have it off, consider joining us!

Your organizer, Jacki Rose will conduct this session. She has been using computers for over 30 years, has earned over a thousand dollars selling on ebay, and is able to find just about anything she wants within seconds on the internet.  She also is savvy in word, excel, emails, etc.  Come and get all your questions answered and become more savvy on the computer.

 

There is a cafe located in the store. Feel free to purchase snack and/or beverage and bring it into the Event Room.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the event room back of store.
item.name: Computer Class for Meetup Members
